Title(s): The Fifftene Tokyns aforn the Doom
_description: The Fifftene Tokyns aforn the Doom, attributed to Lydgate — eleven 8-line stanzas

BLHar2255.First Lines:
As the doctour Sanctus IeronimusWhich that knew by
                    inspiracioun…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…A for this day that al men been so wyseThorugh cristes
                    passioun that they may come to blisse. Explicit
BLHar2255.Attributed Title: The fifftene toknys A forn the doom (f. 117, in rubric)
